item.title: Tar Backup and Restore
item.description: Preamble In my quest to learn and become more proficient with computers, I will often have some kind of ongoing personal project that I will work on in my spare time. Over the past few weeks the project that has taken up my evenings has been building a Linux From Scratch system. The goal is to build a working linux system by downloading and compiling everything manually from the source code.
